title: Ep. 36: 'The Watch'
description:
Chris and Andy discuss 'Game of Thrones,' the two poles of TV drama viewership (18:00), the challenges of modern filmmaking vs. TV-making (27:10), Drake’s ‘Views,’ and the impact of event listening on record releases (41:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
